lead_paragraph: In his rambling news conference Sunday, Randy Moss called Bill Belichick the best coach in football history. Moss was bolstering his point as he spoke, seemingly talking his way out of Minnesota and confirming that Belichick had hoodwinked Brad Childress in the Moss trade last month.
snippet: In his rambling news conference Sunday, Randy Moss called Bill Belichick the best coach in football history.

headline.main: Randy Moss Shows That Belichick Is Right, Again

abstract: In his rambling news conference Sunday, Randy Moss called Bill Belichick the best coach in football history.
